name: Now
description:
https://www.coregames.com/games/906846/now---meditation-releax-zen

Take care of yourself by meditating and relaxing, in real-time, with others looking to do the same. Inspired by the book, “Be Here Now” by Ram Dass.   Features: - Be amongst others, who are also meditating and relaxing (multiplayer) - Set an amount of time to meditate - Track how many times you've meditated - Come back daily for a new quote to help you on your journey (coming next week) - Track your full history (coming next week)  “I can do nothing for you but work on myself...you can do nothing for me but work on yourself!” - Ram Dass
